casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Kyle BERRY. No. 389A01-3. Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 27, 2006. Marilyn G. Ozer, William F.W. Massengale, Chapel Hill, for Kyle Berry. William N. Farrell, Senior Deputy Attorney General, Ben David, District Attorney, for State.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 26th day of January 2006 by Attorney General for Extension of Time to File Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Attorney General shall have up to and including the 1st day of March 2006 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 27th day of January 2006."
